ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] An Idea
ygData.msgSnippet: =P so those of us too poor to buy luclin may gather in a lag free area to sell our goods without the disgusting economy of bazaar.. I mean batwings 10ppeach
ygData.messageBody:
=P so those of us too poor to buy luclin may gather in
a lag free area to sell our goods without the
disgusting economy of bazaar.. I mean batwings
10ppeach COME ON.. nuff said *yawn* time for bed


--- Kodaan Kha'iri <kodaan@...> wrote:
> Ummmm.... Why?
> --Kodaan Kha'iri
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: PsyKo
> To: theeverquesttavern@yahoogroups.com
> Sent: Monday, November 18, 2002 1:28 PM
> Subject: [The EverQuest Tavern] An Idea
>
>
> Hey Melefante, what's up? Even tho my idea for
> an
> all mage guild didn't work.. I have a new idea =)
> Bazaar is going to be REOPENED in Freeport... how
> is
> this possible you ask? Well, if we all take our
> business to FP, then we can open up a mini-bazaar
> of
> course for the time being, we won't have the
> niceities
> of AFk and such, but, with enough people there we
> can
> sell on the auction channel and just tell people
> we
> are in FP... the upside to FP is that ANYONE can
> go
> there. (short of certian evil people which may
> often
> use disguises to get in or just up faction) The
> idea,
> is lead by example.. Start selling your goods in
> FP
> and others will come and do the same... if we
> start
> doing this on ALL the servers, verant might take
> and
> do something about it.. who knows, we might even
> have
> afk merchant abilities after a few months.... tell
> your friends ... tell your clients... tell the
> people
> who HATE luclin altogether, the bazaar is opening
> in
> FREEPORT and we SHALL succeed !!!!
>
> talk to yall later,
> Marshun PsyKo,
> AKA Willim Lupin Tribunal server 20th season
>
